attributes.action: Make being drunk a criminal offense (except in your own home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that a way to get this nation back to where it was is to make being drunk in a public place (including the streets) a criminal offense. It is un-nessecary to get drunk. The only place you should be able to get paraletically drunk should be in your own home or at a party in someone elses home away from everything. Our society will be better because of it.
